title: Redox
description: Redox is known for its distinct and vibrant color palette which includes a combination of deep navy blue (0A2239), refreshing mint green (01B287), energetic orange (FF9F1C), dynamic red (E5505A), and regal purple (854C9E). These colors are prominently featured on their website and press materials, reflecting the brand's commitment to innovation and connectivity in the healthcare industry.
